ModMetaData.name: Workbench Connect
ModMetaData.author: jungooji
ModMetaData.description:
Connect multiple workbenches to share bills between them.
when you add/update/delete bill to a workbench, it will be shared with all linked workbenches.
Should be compatible with any mods.
safe to add mid-game. when removing mod, make sure you removed all links before removing mod. if you already removed mod, try save - load again. errors should be fixed.
source: https://github.com/zzzz465/WorkbenchConnect
